body:
D’oh! Of course, I’ve only created one ‘row’ in the erroneous version. Sorry. Thanks for the reply!

On Apr 27, 2015, at 7:24 AM, egor7 <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> It is because all row's in res points to the same []uint8. Seems the last color you put in it is white. So all points now white.
> See example.
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
